text: The 1983 Algerian Cup Final was the 21st final of the Algerian Cup. The final took place on May 20, 1983, at Stade 5 Juillet 1962 in Algiers with kick-off at 19:00. MP Alger beat ASC Oran 4-3 after extra time to win their fourth Algerian Cup. ==Pre-match== ===Details=== {| style="width:92%;" |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK||1 || Mohamed Ait Mouhoub |- |DF||2 || Abdelmajid Oudina |- |DF||5 || Abdelwahab Zenir (c) |- |DF||4 || Bouzid Mahyouz |- |DF||3 || Nacereddine Laroussi |- |MF||8 || Mohamed Rabah Ghrib || || |- |MF||6 || Ali Bencheikh |- |FW||9 || Abdeslam Bousri |- |FW||10 || Nasser Bouiche |- |FW||11 || Noreddine Meghichi |- |MF||7 || Abdenour Bellemou |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |DF||12|| Youcef Farhi || || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Abdennour Kaoua |} |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK||1 || Said Emtir |- |DF||3 || Lakhdar Benarmas |- |DF||2 || Belkacem Guemri |- |DF||5 || Mohamed Belkheïra |- |MF||6 || Bouziane Taibi || || || |- |FW||9 || Hamid Lefdjah |- |MF||10 || Mustapha Boukar |- |MF||8 || Hamid Tasfaout || || |- |MF||11 || Bouabdallah Belhadj || || |- |DF||4 || Touhami Benouedène |- |FW||7 || Redouane Guemri (c) |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |MF||13|| Houari Belkhetouat || || |- |DF||12|| Ali Benhalima || || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Kaddour Bekhloufi |} |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | width=50% valign=top| MATCH OFFICIALS *Assistant referees: ** ** *Fourth official: ** MAN OF THE MATCH * Abdeslam Bousri (MC Alger) | style="width:50%; vertical-align:top;"| MATCH RULES * 90 minutes. * 30 minutes of extra-time if necessary. * Penalty shootout if scores still level. * Seven named substitutes. * Maximum of three substitutions. |} ==References== Cup Algeria Category:Algerian Cup Finals Category:USM Alger matches
title: 1983 Algerian Cup Final
